pages.text: About us you Once Upon a Time there was a place, a Factory of Details & Experiences that decided to sell food… and so it was born. THIS IS ABOUT YOU A place where every detail is designed to create unforgettable experiences. You won’t find pictures of our founders here, because it’s not about who had the guts to start the business, who runs the operations or who is the marketing genius. It’s not about who does the accounting or who decides what’s on the menu. It’s not about the chefs, the cooks, the waiters, the managers, the cocktail makers, the decor artist, or even the playlist guy. It’s all about you. At this place, passion and attention to detail are more than just words – they are a way of life. We focus on creating experiences that are special, unique and personal, because we know that you are the reason we exist. Without you, we would be just another restaurant. You are the one who inspires us to improve, who motivates us to go above and beyond, who keeps us in business. That’s why this space revolves around you: the person who comes to have a drink after work, who enjoys the best brunch with friends, the one who shares business lunches, who dines with friends, who celebrates with us your babyshower, your bachelor party, your product launch, your team building and who creates unforgettable memories with everyone who accompanies you. We are waiting for you, always with open arms and a promise to do everything possible to make your experience exceptional. If we ever fall short of your expectations, please give us another chance. Your feedback helps us grow and improve. We appreciate you sharing your feedback with us, and we take it very seriously. So, if you’re wondering about the team behind the scenes, know that there’s a great group of dedicated professionals-founders, managers, chefs, servers and many others-who work tirelessly to ensure that every visit is memorable. But we all understand one thing: YOU ARE THE STAR OF THIS SHOW. Your browser does not support the video tag. Our clients reviews First time at the restaurant, and I loved the place. As soon as I arrived, I was greeted with a big smile from the server Andrés, whose treatment was special. We told him we were celebrating our anniversary, and he surprised us with champagne. The food was high quality, the service was quick, and the atmosphere was calm. Dayana Valdés Radillo The place is very cozy, both the indoor dining area and the terrace. It has a spectacular view that you can enjoy for hours. I loved the food and the service from Alejandra, who was our server. Everything she recommended was exquisite. Yaimara Posada Client Fui a celebrar mi aniversario,fue una experiencia increible.La atenciòn merece realmente 5 estrellas.La comida espectácular.Solo puedo dar gracias por la tarde tan especial que pasé en este lugar. Liudyanis Rodriguez Guethon Beautiful restaurant... lovely view of the canal, and a very warm ambiance. The menu is good, offering various types of dishes, including pasta, fish, and meat. What I had for dinner was excellent... very tasty and flavorful, though the presentation could be improved. The wine list is also good. The waiter's service was great. ... and without a doubt, I would return and recommend it to my friends. Marcelo Bocetti I went to celebrate my anniversary with my wife. We were visiting Miami, and while searching online, we found this place, made a reservation, and it was spectacular. When we arrived, we were warmly we[...] Yonathan Osorio We tried the paella, had tostones for starters, and sampled their desserts. Everything was delicious, with international traditional dishes featuring an extra something that made it all even tastier. The place is centrally located, beautiful, and well-decorated, with a great atmosphere. It's also very close to Brickell City Center. Excellent overall. The server, Tony, was fantastic! Ana Gabriela M Kim Herrera Wow, I loved this place! The service is 5 stars—our server Junior was fantastic. He recommended great drinks and dishes, and he was super friendly. The drinks are a must-try, and this place has a gr[...] Carelis Enriquez Second time visiting, and the croquettes are incredible—the paella is great too. It's a lovely atmosphere, and you can make reservations until 11:30 pm. It's not the best place to bring kids, but it[...] Carlos Caruso A very beautiful place that's always busy. The staff is friendly and always ready to help. Here, you'll find everything you could possibly need. The food is spectacular, with great flavor, and the environment is truly well-equipped and cozy, right in the heart of the big city. Plus, they have great prices. Thanks, Gracias. Miguel Arbeloa Secure your spot for an unforgettable dining experience with PassionGroup Miami! Indulge in exquisite flavors, unparalleled ambiance, and create lasting memories.

Contact us
We love to hear your feedback so we can continually improve and provide you with the best experience possible. Our team will contact you personally as soon as possible.

a message
If you need assistance in organizing the private event of your dreams, don’t hesitate to contact us. Give us a call at 305-8423615 or you can write to us at events@prgbrickell.com
If your inquiry is not related to events, we’ll be happy to assist you. Just fill out the form, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
If you prefer writing directly, feel free to email us at: info@passionrestaurantgroup.com.

With its truly unique lounge setting and picturesque water front dining it is one of Brickell’s most upscale preferred destinations.
Book Now
At the mark on Brickell
Imagine stepping into a place…
Where every detail is designed to transport you to a magic World. As you enter Crazy About You, you’re greeted by a warm breeze, and it becomes clear that this isn’t just dinner—it’s a waterfront dining experience that beckons you to relax and unwind. The sky shifts from soft orange to deep purple as the sun sets, painting a breathtaking backdrop to your evening as you enjoy your meal or your Lovers Lane Lemonade.
As you sip, you notice the other guests around you, laughing and enjoying themselves, each one caught up in their own moment of joy.
The air is filled with the sound…
Of clinking glasses and lively conversation. It’s as if you’ve entered a hidden oasis in the heart of the city. Then, there’s the food—vibrant, creative, and bursting with flavor. Each dish is an invitation to explore, to share, and to savor. You start with a selection of tapas, each one more enticing than the last, and move on to a main course that leaves you wondering how it could get any better. But it does, with a dessert that feels like a sweet dream. By the time the evening ends, you’re already planning your next visit, knowing that no two experiences here are ever the same.
SO BOOK NOW!

We’re shaking things up with a spectacular offer: 50% off on all cocktails and beers!  Whether you’re a fan of classic cocktails or enjoy sipping on a cold, refreshing beer, Crazy Happy Hour has something to quench every thirst and delight every palate. Cheers to great deals, great company, and unforgettable moments.
HALF OFF IN ALL COCKTAILS AND BEERS
And an exiting 25% off all bar food!
Unleash your weekday madness with our promotion! An irresistible temptation that will make your jump for joy. So gather your friends, co-workers or anyone in the mood for a good time and join us all day long to fill up on laugh, good drinks and the best ocean views in Brickell.

Plan Your Event With Us!
Looking for the perfect venue to host your next event? Look no further! Our restaurant offers the ideal setting for all your special occasions.
Whether it’s a birthday celebration, anniversary dinner, corporate gathering, or any other event, our dedicated team is here to ensure everything runs smoothly from start to finish.
With our delicious menu options, impeccable service, and inviting ambiance, your guests are sure to have an unforgettable experience.
Contact us today to discuss your event needs and let us help you create memories that will last a lifetime!
